basics.objective: Looking forward to working full-time on stack-appropriate projects in a friendly team. Ready and willing to relocate.
basics.name: Shablonov Denis
basics.label: Web/Desktop Developer
basics.summary:
>‚Å†Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
-- _Linus Torvalds_

A good day to you! üëã 
‚Å†I'm a desktop developer with a wide array of skills, mostly in desktop and full-stack web development **currently migrating to ASP.NET, React-Redux, Postgres and Docker**.‚Å†
Having work experience in many fields and a good grasp of English allowed me to become an open-minded and adaptable worker. Thanks to it, I can learn almost any technology on the fly.
I've **supported and developed** analytical systems for the Central Bank of Russia (C# WPF + ORACLE) and **currently developing** a service for skydivers (React-Redux frontend + ASP.NET Core backend).

I'm most passionate about cybersecurity, reverse engineering, and projects that can make a positive impact on the world üòä 
Every day I stay on top of the news regarding cybersecurity, hacking, various development technologies, and AI technologies. I'm an able GNU/Linux power user, able to tailor deb-based and pac-based distros to the task at hand.  

My other fields of expertise include: 
- Natural Language Processing (NLP) and text processing; 
- Working with GNU/Linux and Docker containers to support DevOps processes; 
- Integration of new technologies into a given project; 
- Ensuring inter-team communication; 
- Low-level technologies: embedded systems (C) and reverse engineering.‚Å†

highlights: Victorious in regional and national English language championships
The "editor -> repository" pipeline has been **accelerated** by ~80%, **greatly improving** the desktop team's performance;
The ORACLE database server has been **pruned** of superfluous entities with an automated script by ~60% **without breaking** any vital systems;
**Introduced** a semi-automated upload script from Excel files into the database, **reducing** the user's required tech entry level;
**Introduced** the web-development team to various new tools of React-Redux, and its integration capabilities with various editors, thus **bolstering** the quality of their work;
work.summary:
‚Å†Limon Ltd is involved in the developing of custom information systems, providing clients with comprehensive tech support with all arising problems regarding their systems, and also conducts a wide array of consulting services. ‚Å†I was ‚Å†thoroughly‚Å† involved with the support and development of the desktop Analytical System for the Central Bank of Russia "Prognoz". I've primarily worked with C# WPF for the desktop app and ORACLE SQL for the app's database. ‚Å†Furthermore, I've written many modules in the app on my own and have gained a lot of experience with writing complex queries, triggers, and stored functions on ORACLE PL\SQL.
‚Å†Afterward, I was transferred to the Web-development team and was introduced to the service for organizing skydivers (React-Redux + ASP.NET)
work.name: Limon Ltd.

highlights: **Built** model-backend infrastructure from the ground up;
Lead NLP research efforts for the company;
work.summary: ‚Å†Seuslab Ltd. is invested in creating products, technologies, and solutions in the IT-sphere for investigative purposes, analytical research, digital search, and preemptive threat detection in social media. ‚Å†I was tasked with developing language models for the Russian language to detect socially dangerous trends. The majority of the development was done in Python, and the service's backend was written in Java.‚Å† Aside from my direct responsibilities, I was also tasked with the research and development of new Natural Language Processing methods.‚Å†
work.name: Seuslab Ltd.

highlights: **Rewrote** the existing driver infrastructure into pseudo-OOP code that is **easier** to maintain and read;
**Applied** and repurposed custom USB and MicroSD drivers to interface with the computer and upload the firmware to respectively;
Wrote custom error handling for the board, which **simplified** the debug process;
work.summary: ‚Å†Public Joint Stock Company "Morion" is a national-level company that is tightly involved with the development, production, installation, and maintenance of telecommunication hardware across the country. ‚Å†My main role in this company was the development and documentation of embedded software for Network Interface Cards (NICs). I was heavily involved with STM32-based boards, –° language for this platform, the assembly language, and IAR.
work.name: Morion
